metadata.title: CVE-2020-35730 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
An XSS issue was discovered in Roundcube Webmail before 1.2.13, 1.3.x before 1.3.16, and 1.4.x before 1.4.10. The attacker can send a plain text e-mail message, with JavaScript in a link reference element that is mishandled by linkref_addindex in rcube_string_replacer.php.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-35730` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 1.4.10+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-core - 1.4.10+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-mysql - 1.4.10+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-pgsql - 1.4.10+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-plugins - 1.4.10+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-sqlite3 - 1.4.10+dfsg.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: roundcube package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.10+dfsg.1-1').
